item.title: Tani add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Tani add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Don't part with your illusions. When they are gone you may still exist, but you have ceased to live." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Tani add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Tani add a quote by Kristin Cashore
item.description: "How absurd it was that in all seven kingdoms, the weakest and most vulnerable of people - girls, women - went unarmed and were taught nothing of fighting, while the strong were trained to the highest reaches of their skill." -- Kristin Cashore

item.title: Tani add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "When I hear another express an opinion which is not mine, I say to myself, he has a right to his opinion, as I to mine. Why should I question it? His error does me no injury, and shall I become a Don Quixote, to bring all men by force of argument to one opinion? ...Be a listener only, keep within yourself, and endeavor to establish with yourself the habit of silence, especially in politics." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Tani add a quote by E.M. Forster
item.description: "Mistrust all enterprises that require new clothes." -- E.M. Forster

item.title: Tani add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The Lord is my shepherd. I shall not want for nothing. He makes me lie down in the green pastures. He greases up my head with oil. He gives me kung-fu in the face of my enemies. Amen" -- Stephen King

item.title: Tani add a quote by Lois McMaster Bujold
item.description: "Reputation is what other people know about you. Honor is what you know about yourself." -- Lois McMaster Bujold
